# I have successfully harvested **10 copper ore**. Now, I need to smelt this copper ore into copper plates before I can craft the necessary electronic circuits.

# I will place a furnace to smelt the copper ore into copper plates. Since I already have a furnace in my inventory, I will position it and insert the copper ore along with some coal for fuel.

# First, I will place the furnace near my current location.
furnace_position = Position(x=1.0, y=0.0)  # Defining a position for the furnace.
furnace = place_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, position=furnace_position)  # Placing the furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)  # Inserting coal into the furnace for fuel.
insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting copper ore into the furnace for smelting.

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete and check the inventory for copper plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum wait time of 30 seconds
    if inspect_inventory()[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 5:  # Checking if I have at least 5 copper plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an error if smelting didn't finish.

# After checking, I will inspect the inventory again to see how many copper plates I have.
